text.text_translated:
Most people think poor countries are in a very bad situation. They believe the people are very poor. They think the countries have bad leaders. And they think there is no hope for a good change.

But this is not true. A big change is happening now. In the last 20 years, many things got better. More than 700 million people have more money. They are not poor anymore.

Also, six million fewer children die from sickness every year. Millions more girls are in school. And millions of people can get clean water.
